entry.title: WIND WARNING , Ingonish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.4°C

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning then changing to rain at times heavy this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning then becoming south 60 gusting to 100 this afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending this evening then cloudy. A few showers beginning overnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 100 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 this evening then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 30%
